Name: team_size_constraint
Description: The size of a team must be within a specified range (e.g.

Name: project_deadline_must_be_met
Description: The project end date must not exceed a fixed deadline.

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: A sprint must have a fixed duration (e.g.

Name: worker_availability_limit
Description: An individual worker's availability cannot exceed 100%.

Name: budget_not_exceeded
Description: The total cost of all projects must not exceed the overall organizational budget.

Name: feature_requires_skills
Description: A feature can only be assigned to a team if the team's collective skills meet the feature's requirements.

Name: unique_worker_assignment
Description: A worker can only be assigned to one primary team at a time.

Name: sprint_scope_capacity
Description: The total story points in a sprint backlog cannot exceed the team's known velocity.

Name: blocker_severity_requires_attention
Description: Blockers with 'Critical' severity must be resolved within 24 hours.

Name: definition_of_done_met
Description: A user story cannot be marked 'Done' unless all acceptance criteria are met.

Name: product_owner_approval_required
Description: A feature cannot be included in a release plan without Product Owner approval.
